title: Will Biden Sell Advanced Drones to Ukraine?
description:
Both Russia and Ukraine are using low-cost kamikaze drones. Now the Biden administration is considering giving Kyiv one of the premiere U.S. weapons of the war on terror.

The post Will Biden Sell Advanced Drones to Ukraine? appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Bonfire of the Twitterverse
description:
Will the social media giant survive Elon Musk’s leadership intact?

The post Bonfire of the Twitterverse appeared first on The Intercept.
